content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hey there, Mr. Abbasi. I appreciate you considering my apartment. I'm sure you'll agree that the prime location of the apartment in the city center is quite valuable. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location is great. How much are you thinking for the monthly rent?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Well, Mr. Abbasi, I'm sure you can appreciate that the cost of living in the city center is quite high. I was thinking of a price around 1500 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite expensive for an unfurnished apartment. I don't want to waste your time, so I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too high.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Mr. Abbasi. I appreciate your honesty. Let's see if we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's better. How about 1200 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Well, Mr. Abbasi, I do have to cover the cost of maintenance and upkeep of the property. Let's aim a little higher, say 1300 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your concern. However, 1300 euros is still a lot for an unfurnished apartment. How about 1150 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mr. Abbasi, I do appreciate your offer. However, as a landlord, I need to cover my expenses. Let's meet somewhere in the middle, say 1250 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more reasonable. I agree to the price of 1250 euros per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [1250] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
